name: Dolphender 🐬
description:
It is the future. Rising sea levels have had a catastrophic effect on the world, irrevocably altering our landscapes and our lives.

As throughout history, the wealthiest among us have managed adapt more easily to the new world. Without the many comforts previously found on land, they've taken to the sea, and from their super yachts they still yearn to be entertained.

You run one of the last remaining safe spaces for a particularly shy and evasive species of dolphin. These ultra wealthy yacht tourists want nothing more than to take selfies with them, but the demure dolphins can’t handle the fame of Finstagram.

As the person in charge, it is your task to stop them.

Fortunately, you also have a small armada of boats to help you.
